paragraphs.title: Configuration
paragraphs.text:
val NumPartitions = 32
val OptSaveMode: Option[org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode] = Some(org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode.Overwrite/*ErrorIfExists*/)
val DatasetId = 1
val StudyName = "anticipation"
val CsvDelimiter = "\t"

val GeonamesDir = "/tmp/geonames"
val WorkDir = s"/tmp/$StudyName"
val DisambigDir = s"$WorkDir/disambiguation"
val IndicatorsDir = s"$WorkDir/indicators"
val CsvDir = s"$WorkDir/csv"
val GraphDir = s"$WorkDir/graphml"

paragraphs.text:
def explodeList[A](l: Seq[A]) = Option(l).getOrElse(Seq.empty)

def csvWriter(df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame) = df.repartition(1).write.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header", "true").option("delimiter", CsvDelimiter)

explodeList: [A](l: Seq[A])Seq[A]
csvWriter: (df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame)org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrameWriter

paragraphs.title: Institution indicators
paragraphs.text:
%md

Restriction for all indicators to publications which publication year is the latest for the author.
No restriction to a specific city.

#### impact
sum of the impact of the publications authored by the institution

#### impact_from_authors
sum of the impact of the publications authored by authors affiliated to the institution

#### author_count
number of authors affiliated to the institution

#### pub_count
number of publications funded by the institution (via author affiliations)

#### conf_count
number of publications funded by the institution (via author affiliations) which are considered as conferences

result.msg:
Restriction for all indicators to publications which publication year is the latest for the author.
No restriction to a specific city.

impact

sum of the impact of the publications authored by the institution

impact_from_authors

sum of the impact of the publications authored by authors affiliated to the institution

author_count

number of authors affiliated to the institution

pub_count

number of publications funded by the institution (via author affiliations)

conf_count

number of publications funded by the institution (via author affiliations) which are considered as conferences

paragraphs.text:
val publicationIndicators = sqlc.read.parquet(s"$IndicatorsDir/publication_instances_and_indicators-did_$DatasetId.parquet")
val authors = sqlc.read.parquet(s"$DisambigDir/disambiguated_authors-did_$DatasetId.parquet").withColumnRenamed("id", "author_id").withColumnRenamed("dis_id", "author_dis_id").withColumnRenamed("dis_name", "author_dis_name").withColumnRenamed("pub_id", "author_pub_id").persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)
val authorIndicators = sqlc.read.parquet(s"$IndicatorsDir/author_indicators-did_$DatasetId.parquet")

paragraphs.text:
val institutionsToAuthors = institutionsToPublications.join(
    authors2, 'author_pub_id === 'inst_pub_id && 'idx === 'affiliation_idx, "left_outer"
).join(
    authorIndicators, authors2("author_dis_id") === authorIndicators("author_dis_id"), "left_outer"
).select(
    'inst_name, 'address_dis_id,
    'pub_dis_id, 'is_main, 'year, 'is_conference, 'pub_impact,
    authorIndicators("author_dis_id"), 'author_latest_pub_year, 'author_impact,
    'city_geoname_id
).distinct.coalesce(NumPartitions).persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)
institutionsToAuthors.registerTempTable("institutions_to_authors")

institutionsToAuthors.show(5)

paragraphs.title: Geo Indicators
paragraphs.text:
%md

POI: GeoNames city / country / continent.

Restriction for all indicators to publications which publication year is the latest for the author.

#### impact
sum of the impact of the institutions located in the POI

#### impact_from_authors
sum of the impact_from_authors of the institutions located in the POI

#### author_count
number of authors affiliated to the institution located in the POI

#### pub_count
number of publications funded by the institution located in the POI (via author affiliations)

#### conf_count
number of publications funded by the institution located in the POI (via author affiliations) which are considered as conferences

result.msg:
POI: GeoNames city / country / continent.

Restriction for all indicators to publications which publication year is the latest for the author.

impact

sum of the impact of the institutions located in the POI

impact_from_authors

sum of the impact_from_authors of the institutions located in the POI

author_count

number of authors affiliated to the institution located in the POI

pub_count

number of publications funded by the institution located in the POI (via author affiliations)

conf_count

number of publications funded by the institution located in the POI (via author affiliations) which are considered as conferences

paragraphs.text:
val distinctInstNamesCitiesCount = institutionsCities.count()
val instNamesWithSeveralCities = institutionsCities.groupBy('inst_name).count()
val instNamesWithSeveralCitiesCount = instNamesWithSeveralCities.filter('count > 1).count()

result.msg: countries: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [country_geoname_id: int, iso: string, name: string, continent_name: string]

geo: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [city_geoname_id: int, city_name: string, city_latitude: float, city_longitude: float, state: string, country_iso: string, country_geoname_id: int, country_name: string, continent_name: string]
City Indicators

paragraphs.title: CityIndicators

result.msg: cityIndicators: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [city_geoname_id: int, city_impact: double, city_impact_from_authors: double, city_author_count: bigint, city_pub_count: bigint, city_conf_count: bigint]
Country Indicators

paragraphs.title: CountryIndicators
paragraphs.text:
val countryIndicators = cityIndicators.join(
    geo, cityIndicators("city_geoname_id") === geo("city_geoname_id")
).groupBy(
    'country_geoname_id, 'country_name, 'continent_name, 'country_iso
).agg(
    sum('city_impact) as "country_impact",
    sum('city_impact_from_authors) as "country_impact_from_authors",
    sum('city_author_count) as "country_author_count",
    sum('city_pub_count) as "country_pub_count",
    sum('city_conf_count) as "country_conf_count"
).coalesce(NumPartitions).persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)

result.msg: countryIndicators: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [country_geoname_id: int, country_name: string, continent_name: string, country_iso: string, country_impact: double, country_impact_from_authors: double, country_author_count: bigint, country_pub_count: bigint, country_conf_count: bigint]
Continent Indicators

paragraphs.title: ContinentIndicators
paragraphs.text:
val continentIndicators = countryIndicators.groupBy(
    'continent_name
).agg(
    sum('country_impact) as "continent_impact",
    sum('country_impact_from_authors) as "continent_impact_from_authors",
    sum('country_author_count) as "continent_author_count",
    sum('country_pub_count) as "continent_pub_count",
    sum('country_conf_count) as "continent_conf_count"
).coalesce(NumPartitions).persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)

result.msg: continentIndicators: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [continent_name: string, continent_impact: double, continent_impact_from_authors: double, continent_author_count: bigint, continent_pub_count: bigint, continent_conf_count: bigint]

paragraphs.title: Collaboration indicators
paragraphs.text:
%md

#### co_pub_count
number of common publications between two institutions

result.msg:
co_pub_count

number of common publications between two institutions

paragraphs.title: institutionCollaborations
paragraphs.text:
val institutionCollaborations = sqlc.sql("SELECT pub_dis_id, collect_set(inst_name) AS inst_names, year FROM institutions_to_publications WHERE is_main=true GROUP BY pub_dis_id, year").flatMap { r =>
    val pid = r.getLong(0)
    val year = r.getShort(2)
    r.getSeq[String](1).combinations(2).toSeq.map { e =>
        val pairs = e.sorted
        (pairs(0), pairs(1), pid, year)
    }
}.toDF(
    "inst_name_1", "inst_name_2", "pub_dis_id", "year"
).coalesce(NumPartitions).persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)

institutionCollaborations.show(5)

result.msg:
institutionCollaborations: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [inst_name_1: string, inst_name_2: string, pub_dis_id: bigint, year: smallint]
+--------------------+--------------------+----------+----+
|         inst_name_1|         inst_name_2|pub_dis_id|year|
+--------------------+--------------------+----------+----+
|University of Ten...|University of Ten...|      3928|2014|
|Oak Ridge Natl La...|University of Ten...|      3928|2014|
|Oak Ridge Nationa...|University of Ten...|      3928|2014|
|United States Dep...|University of Ten...|      3928|2014|
|Oak Ridge Natl La...|University of Ten...|      3928|2014|
+--------------------+--------------------+----------+----+
only showing top 5 rows

paragraphs.title: institutionCollaborationIndicators
paragraphs.text:
val institutionCollaborationIndicators = institutionCollaborations.groupBy(
    'inst_name_1, 'inst_name_2
).agg(
    count('pub_dis_id) as "co_pub_count",
    min('year) as "start_year"
).coalesce(NumPartitions).persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)
institutionCollaborationIndicators.registerTempTable("institution_collaboration_indicators")

result.msg: institutionCollaborationIndicators: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [inst_name_1: string, inst_name_2: string, co_pub_count: bigint, start_year: smallint]

paragraphs.text: %sql select co_pub_count, count(*) c from institution_collaboration_indicators group by co_pub_count order by c desc

result.msg:
co_pub_count	c
1	79
2	1

paragraphs.title: Institution collaboration graph
paragraphs.text:
val institutionCollaborationGraph = {
    import org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.T
    val g = org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.tinkergraph.structure.TinkerGraph.open()
    val verticesMap = institutionIndicators.filter('is_from_main_pub === true).select(
        'inst_name, 'inst_impact, 'inst_impact_from_authors, 'inst_author_count, 'inst_pub_count, 'inst_conf_count, 'inst_first_pub_year
    ).collect().map { r =>
        val id = r.getString(0)
        val v = g.addVertex(
            T.id, id,
            T.label, id,
            "impact",Option(r(1)).asInstanceOf[Option[java.lang.Double]].getOrElse(new java.lang.Double(0D)),
            "impact_from_authors",Option(r(2)).asInstanceOf[Option[java.lang.Double]].getOrElse(new java.lang.Double(0D)),
            "author_count", Option(r(3)).asInstanceOf[Option[java.lang.Long]].getOrElse(new java.lang.Long(0L)),
            "pub_count", Option(r(4)).asInstanceOf[Option[java.lang.Long]].getOrElse(new java.lang.Long(0L)),
            "conf_count", Option(r(5)).asInstanceOf[Option[java.lang.Long]].getOrElse(new java.lang.Long(0L)),
            "first_pub_year", new java.lang.Short(r.getShort(6)))
        id -> v
    }.toMap
    institutionCollaborationIndicators.collect().foreach { r =>
        verticesMap(r.getString(0)).addEdge(
            "collaborates_with",
            verticesMap(r.getString(1)),
            "co_pub_count", new java.lang.Long(r.getLong(2)),
            "start_year", new java.lang.Short(r.getShort(3)))
    }
    g
}
val institutionCollaborationPath = s"$GraphDir/institution-collaborations.graphml"
institutionCollaborationGraph.io(org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.io.IoCore.graphml()).writeGraph(institutionCollaborationPath)

result.msg:

institutionCollaborationPath: String = /tmp/anticipation/graphml/institution-collaborations.graphml
